item.title: Living Energy: distributed-intelligence management and operation for smart energy
item.description:
Project Information

Sponsor: Gwangu Institute of Science and Technology (GIST)

Period: Jan, 2016 - Dec, 2017

Tasks:

  • Optimize electricity load forecasting with energy patterns and factor diversification.
  • Develop perversive demand response (DR) based on Big Data analytics.
  • Drive a long-term analysis and reporting based on load forecasting and electricity consumptions.

Related Knowledge

Electric Load Forecasting, Energy Price Forecasting, Short-term Analytics

Skills

Linux, Python, TensorFlow, Recurrent Neural Networks

Descriptions

This project is ongoing work. I will reveal the progress when we reach the proper level of milestones.
